articles.author: Myles Simmons
articles.title: Philip Rivers will visit, work out with Colts on Tuesday - NBC Sports
articles.description: Rivers retired after spending the 2020 season with Indianapolis, helping the club reach an 11-5 record and a postseason appearance.
articles.content:
The Colts have a surprising candidate to join the team for a stretch run in the wake of Daniel Jones suffering a torn Achilles on Sunday. 
According to a report from NFL Media, Philip Rivers will wo… [+1154 chars]
